original_title: Six Variations on the Same Theme: First Variation
overview: Six Variations presents six silent short films, each with their own unique visual motif that abstracts, interferes with, and obfuscates an archival reel of Kodachrome home movies. The first variation digitally joins two film strips, the home movies that unite all six films, and a hand-processed strip of black film.
title: Six Variations on the Same Theme: First Variation
